The page is set to private, so it is not publicly accessible. Please do not delete this page :) .

about Lonza

The Personal Care business of Lonza Consumer Care is driven by the following philosophy:
Inspire the Formulator... Excite the Consumer... ®

We look to Inspire the Formulator with a portfolio of functional solutions allowing formulators to act on new ideas and solve difficult formulating challenges.

Learn more

Testimonials

Lonza's Personal Care products are setting the trends.

Mike Dolce

Formulator with Amway
“I use this every day because I trust they will deliver the results my team expects”

Peter Clarke

VP of marketing for Revlon
“Lonza is about trust. They’ve been in the market for 120 years so I know what I get”

node.title: Lonza
node.content:
Agro Ingredients

You are now leaving Knowde.

Continue to Lonza's corporate website

Lonza

A Global Leader in Life Science

Spotlight On

Lonza Consumer Health

Consumer Health within Lonza’s Specialty Ingredients segment is focused on becoming the leading partner for the fast-moving consumer goods industry by supporting health, wellness and beauty through science and technology. Lonza’s Consumer Health business includes nutrition and dietary supplement ingredients and delivery systems, hygiene and preservation products, and personal-care offerings. With the addition of Capsugel, Lonza is now an industry leader in nutritional capsules, innovative formulations and finished dosage forms.

Together the teams in Consumer Health are capitalizing on people’s desire for nutritious food and dietary supplementation, for protection from dangerous viruses and other pathogens, and for the ability to look and feel their best. 

Shop Consumer Health

Lonza Business Segments

Personal Care

Discover how we advance the well-being of people around the world by helping our customers create the world's leading health, wellness and beauty products.

Personal Care

Discover how we advance the well-being of people around the world by helping our customers create the world's leading health, wellness and beauty products. Shop Now

Agro Ingredients

Offering versatile actives through established customer relations, as well as expertise in biocides technologies and regulatory environment.

Agro Ingredients

State-of-the-art herbicides, fungicides and bio-derived products among many other important ingredients for the modern food supply. Coming Soon to Knowde

Coatings & Composites

Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit dolor

Coatings & Composites

Wide array of specialty solutions for the protection, enhanced performance and modification of the end-­use characteristics of various materials, including carbon fibers, fabrics, leather, metals, plastics, stone and wood. Coming Soon to Knowde

BioResearch

We're helping solve the greatest challenges in patient care.

BioResearch

We're helping solve the greatest challenges in patient care. Coming Soon to Knowde

Pharma & Biotech

We're helping solve the greatest challenges in patient care.

Pharma & Biotech

We're helping solve the greatest challenges in patient care. Coming Soon to Knowde

Water Treatment

We're one of the world’s leading suppliers of sanitizers and other treatment chemicals for pools, spas and water parks.

Water Treatment

We're one of the world’s leading suppliers of sanitizers and other treatment chemicals for pools, spas and water parks. Coming Soon to Knowde

Lonza Headquarters

Muenchensteinerstrasse 38 CH-4002 Basel Switzerland

As a worldwide leader supplying the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industries with biopharmaceuticals, Lonza furnishes seven different markets with state-of-the-art products, services, and research. Our customers range from professionals within the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, academic, and government research industries to manufacturers of consumer and health products, distributors, formulators, and service companies.
